name: Empowering Afrofuturism and Black Nerd Culture: Content Growth Storytelling in the Age of Web 3 & AI

speakers.name: Aaron "Carl" Lewis
speakers.bio: As a community-first creator and experienced web designer, I am passionate about building and nurturing diverse communities in the crypto, NFT, and metaverse space. With a background in community management, social media, and content creation, I bring innovation, empathy, and a deep understanding of Web3 technologies to my work.
